data.text: Ngamna kasuol mi ngaikha donru, halli inmani imanuom lungduokhan murruolsiak inthopuimaru. Col 2:16
Ajarchu mi lekkhat in inmani ngamna khan phur rakip bakwiak amincha, takkha inngamna kasuol mi'n anse suulpabit abak.
Khale inruoiya angrakip kabak mi'n anse suulpa kabak midiang mateek marase, halli anse suulpabit kabak mi'n angrakip kabak mi diang chong tanmarase, ajarchu Pathian in inmani rakip kha izoot eii.

Mi leiilaak suokngai chongkatansik-ah nang tu-na-eyame? Inmani karu in katha katho in-ebe emakli kase katho in-ebe tikha ama karu in chong atansik eii. Halli inmani kha katha katho in-esik eii, ajarchu Pumi'n inmani kha katha katho amin-e mator.

Miring lekkhat in nikhuo rakipneek-ah nikhuo inkhatkha kheella atha tia inngaidon, halli mi lekkhat in nikhuo rakiphi in-ang wiak tia inngaidon. Khawajarra mi rakip in ama ama ngaidon nakhan kacheet ah ngirrasu.

Nikhuo ngai rakip kaminlur miring in Pumi kayana sik-ah thorase, halli angrakip kabak inmani'n Pumi kayana sik-ah thorasu, ajarchu inmani'n Pathian kha inminpaak, halli angrakip kabakmak mi'n Pumi kayanasik-ah thorasu, halli inmani um Pathian kha inminpaak.
Ajarchu eini rakip in nitheinuo sikbeiya niring emak, halli eini'n nitheinuo sikbeiya nithi emak.
Eini'n niring hichu, Pumi sik-ah niring eii; khat-um eini'n nithi innum Pumi sikbeiya eini'n nithi eii. Khawajarra eini'n niring innum nithi innum eini rakip Pumi ta ni-eii.
Hiwa jarra karing khat-um kathi ngai Pumi enasik ah Christa in kathi makheiya ahongring nookjei.

Halli anse suulpabit kabak ningni'n angjarra ning-u ningnai ngaidiang chong ningtanme? Halli angrakip kabak ningni'n angjarra ning-u ningnai ngaidiang ningmateekme? Tichu eini rakip Pathian maikuungnga ngirnita ama'n chong nalatansik eii. 2 Cor 5:10
Khat-um chong inthiang in ati,
Khale inruoiya eini rakip in ama ama chuontho kha Pathian diang nilapesik eii.
Miring inkhatli inkhat chungnga chongkatan datui, khatneek achu, nimalungnga ngaidon inlang mi ngai insuina emakli manu ah minchulnasik chuon thokhaimaru.
Kei'n Pumi Jisu le kaom suom jarra kei'n inthiangnga kajet, baksaak rakip iteii inthiangmak ommak. Takkha nang in baksaak lekkhat hi inthiangmak eii nati inchu, khawakha nangnasik ah inthiangmak eii.
Takkha nang in nibak ni-in jarra na-u nanai ngaidiang malung intooknasik e-inchu, khawakha minriang lamma nitho emakjei, nang nasaakbak in Christa in ithipi miring khatsik-ah mangna inchang marase!
Halli nang in akatha-eii tia ningaidon khan kathamak-ah narilmarasu.
Ajarchu Pathian Rengram khachu kabak ka-in jarra emak, takkha Ratha Inthiang in inape kadik, kadai khat-um karok makheiya eii.
Khawajarra hinthoa Christa sepa natho inchu Pathian malung nimintaipi eii, khat-um mi ngai innum innazootsik eii.
Kadai khat-um 14:19: Eini'n ni-ngai don sik suok, larik lekkhat in inti, apharakip ah kinngaidon. khatli khat ranak ngarnasik-ah kaheichoi lam ngaikhan eini rakip ngai'n kasongkaraat erui.
Halli Pathian chuontho kha nabak na-in nakhan minmang marase. Takkha baksaak rakip baksik eii, takkha miring inkhat manu minthonasik ajar e-inchu, i-ang inkhattak baksik kha kathamak eii.
Khale inruoiya nang na-u nanai ngai manu thonasik e-inchu meii ka-ei, ju ka-in emakli i-ang inkhattak baksik nithomak kha athawiai.
Khat-um hiwarakip na-ngamna jarra nangli Pathian kongkarra omrase. I-ang inkhattak sik-ah kazoot halli hiwa rakiphi kathamak emak tia katho mikha rawaan katha eii!

Takkha ningni'n ning ibak rakip kha ning inngamsam inchu, ning ibak rakipkha Pathian in zootmak eii, ajarchu inmani chuontho kha ingamna dungjuiya emak. Halli i-ang inkhattak ingamna dungjuiya nithomak inchu khawakha manu eii.
